divs: Sighting Detailswell i was sitting outside in my terris watching t.v. at night about 11:00 pm or 11:15 pm. and i saw a big flash in the sky, like lighting but not lighting.i looked in the flash of light and all i saw was a big flash in sky and all the flash of light got like sucked in to a big moon like shape and moved away like at the speed of light.and in a matter of seconds it was gone no sound no nothing. i thought it was like a star falling but it was to big, not on fire ,like some commet's or shooting star ,but no it was all white like the moon, same shape.it was crazy...i was kinda mad cuz my wife did'ent see it. she just saw the flash. but my neighbor saw it to he was driving comeing home around the same time....
Summary: A big flash in the night cloudy sky. it lit the whole sky for like 1 sec,or 2 .
